input: Which of these is one similarity of the elements in the first group of the periodic table?
output: The elements in the group react with oxygen in similar ways.
options: The elements in the group have similar atomic masses.
The elements in the group have the same number of electrons.
The elements in the group are very unreactive metals.
The elements in the group react with oxygen in similar ways.

input: Which activity is an example of a chemical change?
Which of the following questions is testable in a scientific investigation?
output: Are cats more active at night than during the day?.
options: Are dogs better pets than cats?.
Are dogs happy when they are walked?.
Are cats more active at night than during the day?.
Are cats easier to take care of than dogs?.

input: The majority of the fresh water on Earth is frozen in glaciers and ice caps. If the climate changed around the world, causing glaciers and ice caps to melt, which situation would most likely occur?
The Periodic Table of the Elements is arranged so that elements with similar characteristics are in the same column. Which element is a highly reactive metal?
If there is a great deal of precipitation occurring in a short time, which process in the water cycle will be affected first?
Margaret is running a full lap around a circular track. She is facing north when she starts. What direction will she be facing after she has completed half of a lap?
Some water use is consumptive. Instead of returning to its source, the water evaporates from reservoirs or transpires from crops. How does this type of use most likely affect the hydrosphere?
output: by shifting water to different stages in the water cycle
options: by reducing the total amount of water on Earth
by altering the paths of the water through the Earth system
by shifting water to different stages in the water cycle
by affecting climate in a way that alters the water cycle
